organic_results.title: Open-space schools: The opportunity to become ambitious
organic_results.snippet: Ambition in women teachers is analyzed in relation to opportunities available in the work setting. Open-space elementary schools with team teaching, in contrast to traditional schools, provide the teacher with greater opportunities for interaction, influence and informal rewards. These opportunities are associated with a high frequency of" professional ambition" among women teachers in the open-space school and account for a positive association between" professional ambition" and job satisfaction that is found only among …
